plot: Two friends escape from the Japanese army after being forced into service. One returns to his home, but the other is apparently recaptured
title: Gwihyang
plot_es: Two friends escape from the Japanese army after being forced into service. One returns to his home, but the other is apparently recaptured
plot_en: Two friends escape from the Japanese army after being forced into service. One returns to his home, but the other is apparently recaptured
